mapper.sql: Id, request_id, review_num, project_id, purchase_dept, method, supplier, amount, submit_time, remark, file_url, status, creater, create_time, update_time, delete_time, is_delete

select
distinct
from purchase_review
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select:
select COUNT(*) from purchase_review r,project p where r.project_id=p.id
and p.project_name like "%"#{projectName}"%"
and p.project_code like "%"#{projectCode}"%"
and r.method=#{method}
